languages.text: "Здесь действуют Арбитес — найдите укрытие и не создавайте помех правосудию Императора".
"The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."
languages.original_text: "Здесь действуют Арбитес — найдите укрытие и не создавайте помех правосудию Императора".

traits.locale_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."
"The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."
"The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."
"The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."
"The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."
"The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

languages.text: « L'Arbites opère dans ce secteur. Mettez-vous à l'abri et ne faites pas obstacle à la justice de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

traits.locale_text: « L'Arbites opère dans ce secteur. Mettez-vous à l'abri et ne faites pas obstacle à la justice de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "In diesem Gebiet operieren die Arbites. Also geht in Deckung und steht der Gerechtigkeit des Imperators nicht im Weg."
languages.original_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

traits.locale_text: "In diesem Gebiet operieren die Arbites. Also geht in Deckung und steht der Gerechtigkeit des Imperators nicht im Weg."

languages.text: 「この地域では高等裁定局が作戦行動中です。身を隠し、いかなる形でも皇帝陛下の正義の妨げにならないようにしてください」
languages.original_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

traits.locale_text: 「この地域では高等裁定局が作戦行動中です。身を隠し、いかなる形でも皇帝陛下の正義の妨げにならないようにしてください」

languages.text: «Hay una operación del Arbites en esta zona. Póngase a cubierto y no obstruya la justicia del Emperador de ningún modo».
languages.original_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

traits.locale_text: «Hay una operación del Arbites en esta zona. Póngase a cubierto y no obstruya la justicia del Emperador de ningún modo».

languages.text: “帝国法务部正在这片区域采取行动。赶紧躲在掩体后面，不要妨碍帝皇的正义之手。”
languages.original_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

traits.locale_text: “帝国法务部正在这片区域采取行动。赶紧躲在掩体后面，不要妨碍帝皇的正义之手。”

languages.text: "Arbites, bu bölgede faaliyet gösteriyor. Bir köşede kendinizi korumaya alın ve İmparator'un adaletine müdahale etmeyin."
languages.original_text: "The Arbites are operating in this area. Find cover and do not obstruct the Emperor's justice in any way."

traits.locale_text: "Arbites, bu bölgede faaliyet gösteriyor. Bir köşede kendinizi korumaya alın ve İmparator'un adaletine müdahale etmeyin."
